extendedInfo.description: Take your own Asheville brewery tour!The "Asheville Breweries" Android application provides selectable Google Maps markers for the Asheville area's craft breweries, including all the member breweries of the Asheville Brewers Alliance (http://www.ashevillebrewersalliance.com).  Each marker shows the location of a brewery -- select a marker to see more details about that brewery.- To find a specific brewery on the map, use the "Find" option in the menu.- For a selected brewery, press the "Share" button to share that brewery's details with friends.- To open the Google Maps application for more map options, such as street view and turn-by-turn directions, select the "Open Maps" button.Asheville, NC has long appealed to visitors and residents with its stunning mountain setting, popular attractions like the Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway, and its arts and crafts heritage, and is now also recognized as a national "brewtopia". Asheville won the vote for "Beer City, USA" four years in a row in Examiner.com polls by Charlie Papazian, one of the most recognized names in the realm of beer and brewing.The Asheville area is home to several craft breweries, each serving and distributing multiple beer styles. These beers are available in-house and in local restaurants, with some distributed further afield regionally and nationally. Enjoy your time sampling some of the Asheville area's local brews, and be sure to drink responsibly and use a designated driver.The intent is to include markers only for establishments that brew beer on-site.  All information is to the best of our knowledge, and any omissions or errors are unintentional.  Please contact us with any revisions or additions.Follow Asheville area beer news on Twitter using this hashtag: #avlbeer.Current breweries:Altamont Brewing CompanyAsheville Brewing CoAsheville Pizza and BrewingBearWaters Brewing CompanyBlue Mountain PizzaBrevard Brewing CompanyCatawba Valley Brewing CompanyFrench Broad BrewingFrog Level Brewing CompanyGreen Man BreweryHeinzelmÃ¤nnchen BreweryHi-Wire BrewingHighland BrewingLexington Avenue BreweryLookout Brewing CompanyNantahala Brewing CompanyOskar Blues BreweryOysterhouse BrewingPisgah BrewingSouthern Appalachian BreweryThirsty Monk SouthTipping Point TavernWedge BrewingWicked Weed Brewing

reviews.comment: Needs more additional content, but nice to see in the App market. AVL beer rules!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome. This is an easy way to find all the local brews!
reviews.author: A Google User
